channel.title: Loginerror, need help
channel.description:
Always when i try to login to a server, i stay logged in for only 1 second! :mad: Then the client says this in the console: [04:25:15] Could't create directory logs [04:25:15] [04:25:15] Logging into (moparplayer, *****) [04:25:16] Your UID is:33323450 Error: T2 - 97,126,171 - 2,0,0 - 28,-24 (note: this are always other numbers)
WTF IS THIS??? :confused: WHAT CAN I DO AGAINST IT??? :confused:
I am sorry for my bad English.
EDIT: still no replies! Plz help me...

item.title: Loginerror, need help
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

If your using the Moparscape Webclient, it happens to me to… so i just uploaded my client and people have to download it to play… try client.silabsoft.org and see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Loginerror, need help

item.description:

Always when i try to login to a server, i stay logged in for only 1 second! :mad:
Then the client says this in the console:
[04:25:15] Could’t create directory logs
[04:25:15]
[04:25:15] Logging into (moparplayer, *****)
[04:25:16] Your UID is:33323450
Error: T2 - 97,126,171 - 2,0,0 - 28,-24 (note: this are always other numbers)

WTF IS THIS??? WHAT CAN I DO AGAINST IT???

I am sorry for my bad English.
